messages.message: 'cleanedResponse' is never reassigned. Use 'const' instead.

fix.text:
const cleanedResponse = response
          .replace(/^(Subject:|Person:|Character:|Main subject:)\s*/i, '') // Remove subject prefixes
          .replace(/\s+/g, ' ') // Normalize whitespace
          .trim();
